Key Match Events: Herro scored five points in a 13-3 run in the second quarter that put the Heat ahead 51-34 with less than four minutes to play
Miscellaneous Highlights: Before the game, NBA Commissioner Adam Silver said the league had reached an agreement with local organizers to play more games in Mexico
Others: Bilal Coulibaly led Washington with 22 points. Jordan Poole added 21 points and Alexandre Sarr had 17
